inventoryReports.title: Inventory Analytics
inventoryReports.description: Stock valuation, aging analysis, and ABC classification
inventoryReports.lotsNoMovement: lots with no movement in 90+ days
inventoryReports.turnoverHint1: Higher turnover = faster-selling inventory (typically 4-6x is healthy for retail)
inventoryReports.turnoverHint2: Days in Inventory shows how long stock sits before being sold
inventoryReports.turnoverHint3: Low turnover may indicate overstocking or slow-moving items
